#load packages

```{r}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
library(phyloseq)
library(fantaxtic)
```


#source codes

#read processed data

```{r import}
#change "16S" to "ITS" to rarefy ITS data

otus_data <- read.csv(paste0(path_out, "/231202_Sugi_phyllosphere_June_16S/processed_data/otus_data_16S.csv"), row.names = 1)
rownames(otus_data) <- formatC(as.numeric(rownames(otus_data)), width = 4, flag = "0") #add 0 to rownames

tax_table <- read.csv(paste0(path_out, "/231202_Sugi_phyllosphere_June_16S/processed_data/tax_table2_16S.csv"), row.names = 1)
tax_table <- as.matrix(tax_table)

metadata <- read_excel(paste0(path_out, "/231202_Sugi_phyllosphere_June_16S/processed_data/metadata_2306.xlsx"), 
                       sheet = "Sheet1")
metadata <- column_to_rownames(metadata, var = "Sample_Name")

load(paste0(path_out, "/231202_Sugi_phyllosphere_June_16S/processed_data/trees.Rdata"))
```

```{r}
metadata$cloneID <- as.factor(metadata$cloneID)
metadata$population <- as.factor(metadata$population)
metadata$site <- as.factor(metadata$site)
metadata$date <- as.factor(metadata$date)

# add clone_ID to rownames (why needed?)
rownames(otus_data) <- paste0(rownames(metadata), "_", metadata$population)
rownames(metadata) <- paste0(rownames(metadata), "_", metadata$population)
```

#barplot

```{r barplot}
ps_0 <- phyloseq(otu_table(otus_data[51:108, ], taxa_are_rows = F), 
                 tax_table(tax_table), 
                 phy_tree(tree2$data), 
                 sample_data(metadata[51:108, ])) #change row indices to choose samples included in barplots
```

```{r, cache=TRUE, dependson="barplot"}
# top_taxa(上位10Genus)選別
top_asv <- nested_top_taxa(ps_obj = ps_0, 
                    top_tax_level = "Phylum", 
                    n_top_taxa = 3, 
                    nested_tax_level = "Genus", 
                    n_nested_taxa = 2, 
                    grouping = "site")
```

```{r}
p_comp <- plot_nested_bar(ps_obj = top_asv$ps_obj, 
                      top_level = "Phylum", 
                      nested_level = "Genus")
p_comp <- p_comp + theme_classic()
p_comp <- p_comp + facet_wrap(~ site, 
                      scales = "free_x")
p_comp <- p_comp + labs(y = "Relative Abundance")
p_comp <- p_comp + theme(axis.title.x = element_blank(), 
                         #axis.text.x = element_blank(), 
                         axis.text.x = element_text(size = 2.3, angle = 45, vjust = 1.5,hjust = 1.2), 
                         axis.ticks.x = element_blank(), 
                         axis.title.y = element_text(size = 7), 
                         strip.background.x = element_rect(color = "black", 
                                                           fill = "white"), 
                         strip.text.x = element_text(color = "black", 
                                                     size = 8), 
                         legend.title = element_text(size = 7), 
                         legend.text = element_markdown(size = 5.5), 
                         legend.key.size = unit(1, "mm"))
show(p_comp)
ggsave(plot = p_comp, filename = paste0(path_out, "/231202_Sugi_phyllosphere_June_16S/figures/barplot_16S_kawatabi.png"), 
       dpi = 400, width = 88, height = 45, units = "mm")
#(A4, margin = c(25.4, 25.4), units = "mm")
```
